vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀντιπέρ-ᾱν,
Ionic dialect ἀντιπέρ-ην, adverb ={ἀντιπέρᾱς}, variant in [Refs 5th c.BC+]; also κατ᾽ ἀντιπέραν, with genitive, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]
__II adjective, Ἀσίδα τ᾽ ἀντιπέρην τε Asia and the opposite coast, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]

relatedNos._zh_tw_Gloss: 還, 因, 作, 為
relatedNos._zh_Gloss: 还, 因, 作, 为

vocabInfos.mediumDef:
across from, opposite of
can function as an improper preposition with the genitive, opposite, over against Lk. 8:26*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: prep. con gen. al otro lado, frente a
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: đối ngang; đối diện ; trên bờ đối diện ; ở phía bên kia
